description: This file defines a route component for creating new notes in a Remix-based frontend application. It includes server-side loaders and actions, as well as a React component to render a form for note creation, handling form submission and user session validation.

methods.name: loader
methods.description: Loads user session data and redirects to login if no user is authenticated.

methods.name: action
methods.description: Handles form submission to create a new note, validates input, calls API, and redirects to the new note's page.

methods.name: NewNote
methods.description: React component rendering the note creation form with client-side logic and feedback.
